banner.title: Survey platform collects opinions
banner.desc: The survey and public opinion platform is an independent tool to synthesize assessments on social and economic issues. State agencies use this platform to measure satisfaction with public services and collect opinions on management policies. Surveys and questionnaires are personalized, reaching out to each service and citizen to gather detailed and accurate information.

slider.title: Steps to create a survey form

linkContact.title: Get Started Now: Create Your Survey Form!
linkContact.desc: Get started today by creating your survey form! Convenient, flexible and fully customizable, our website will help you quickly collect important opinions from your audience.

footer.address: Tầng 21, Tòa nhà Cục Viễn thông, số 68 đường Dương Đình Nghệ, Yên Hòa, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội
